data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Holiday and Special-Date Pricing Override. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Different fee rules by service type". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
